name: Data Protection Policy
description: Primary policy for data protection governance

name: Consent Management Policy
description: Framework for managing consent collection and withdrawal

name: Data Transfer Policy
description: Guidelines for transferring data to third parties

name: Data Retention Policy
description: Defines retention periods and deletion procedures

name: Grievance Redressal Policy
description: Process for handling data principal grievances

name: Data Access Policy
description: Controls for accessing personal data by authorized personnel

name: Children Data Policy
description: Special protections for children under 18 years

name: Audit and Monitoring Policy
description: Framework for internal and external audits

name: Third Party Policy
description: Requirements for data processors and sub-processors
